page.title: 09TRAVEL AND COMMUNICATION
page.content: Most people have the option to travel by Corporation Bus, British Rail or private motor car. Although our block contains the Erewash Canal it is disused. The M1 passes through our block and a journey to London along the motorway takes about three and a half hours by bus or car. The London to Sheffield Railway passes through our block and travelling by highspeed train it takes 1 hour 40 minutes to London at a cost of Â£12.50 return. Most people travel into Nottingham for entertainment, shopping and employment.
